item.title: Enter Your Information

item.title: About
item.description: Goals: The goal of the Tax Correction Group, LLC. is to ensure that homeowners receive their fair share of tax savings. The Tax Correction Group, LLC. is a limited-liability corporation based out of Huntington, New York. Our organization was founded based on the idea that every person deserves the tax exemptions for which they are eligible, and that nobody should lose money because of the complicated filing process. As such, we strive to make filing as easy as possible.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you Contact us at:    stamatatos@taxcorrectiongroup.com    +1 (631) 827–8901 Please feel free to contact us with any questions, comments, or concerns.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: STAR Eligibility The eligibility criteria are the same for both STAR credit and the STAR property tax exemption. You can’t receive both the credit and the exemption. Eligible properties Houses, condominiums, cooperative apartments, manufactured homes, farm houses mixed-use properties, including apartment buildings (though only the owner-occupied portion) Eligible homeowners Residency – You must own your home and it must be your primary residence Basic STAR Eligibility:
